name: Baldi Builder
description:
Welcome to Baldi Builder! What is Baldi Builder?

Baldi Builder is a Baldi's Basics fangame made with GB Studio 3.1.0. Baldi Builder allows everyone to make their own levels! (With limitations however...)

What are the limitations?

You cannot;

  • Make your own chunks
  • Have more than 4 chunk slots
  • Have more than one editable level
  • Have more than 3 NPC's in a level
  • Edit the NPC's positions
  • Edit the NPC's behaviors
  • Edit the music or palettes without the use of the debug menu
  • Edit other people's level data or use the debug menu in them

Yikes, that's a lot of limitations...

Controls:

UP = W/ArrowUp

DOWN = S/ArrowDown

LEFT = A/ArrowLeft

RIGHT = D/ArrowRight

[Interact] A = Z/J/Alt

[Action] B = X/K/Ctrl

START = Enter/Q

SELECT = RShift/E

Below are the functions of each NPC:

When enabled, Baldi will chase you around after you've collected one book. If you're too far away from him, he'll move to you through the walls (to avoid having Baldi stuck in a corner). Once he reaches you, it's game over!

When enabled, after you've collected a book, It's A Bully will spawn in 1 of 3 places randomly in the current chunk that you're in, for a set amount of time. He wouldn't let anybody (except Gotta Sweep,) pass if they try to go through him!

When enabled, after you've collected a book, Gotta Sweep will spawn in his closet on certain chunks. After some time, he'll move around the chunk before coming back to his closet. The camera will shake when he sweeps you up.
